display.name: nRide web3 mobility network
display.description: nRide is developing a peer-to-peer ride-hailing protocol that connects riders and drivers directly, eliminating intermediaries. By removing middlemen, nRide aims to reduce fees and increase transparency, while also creating a more equitable platform for drivers and riders. Additionally, nRide solves the problem of isolated user bases by providing a standardized way for ride-hailing applications to connect with each other and access a larger user base, fostering a more open and competitive marketplace

widget.title: Join the ride-hailing revolution...
widget.description: Try the app and catch a ride
